text:
Spain, Germany and France have reported the most coronavirus cases since they imposed lockdowns. The three nations lifted significant parts of those lockdown orders in June.

text:
A video of Emma Gonzalez, one of the co-founders of @AMarch4OurLives, teed off a section of remarks on gun violence at tonight's #DemConvention.

"Gun violence isn't just going to stop â€” until there's a force fighting harder against it," she said.

text:
